DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether 120 Unit , 240 unit botulinum toxin A effective treatment migraine without aura prophylaxis .
DOC.brief_title: Dysport® In Migraine Without Aura Prophylaxis : DIMWAP Study
DOC.detailed_description: This 12-week , prospective double-blinded , randomize , multicenter study placebo , 120 Unit , 240 unit botulinum toxin A ( Dysport ® ) injection patient diagnosis Migraine without aura accord International Headache Society criterion . It design evaluate efficacy , safety , tolerability optimum dose Botulinum toxin type A ( Dysport ® ) injection migraine without aura prophylaxis .
